a.n: The Amazing World of Gumball IV

p.k: The Parking / The Upgrade / The Comic The Watterson family's search for a parking space at the mall takes a little longer than expected. / Gumball and Darwin persuade Bobert to upgrade his operating system, then start to wish they hadn't. / Gumball is the star of his own comic, but struggles to match up to his heroic alter-ego.
